source_text: The 580km² Cosmo Gold Project (2) covers the entirety of the Cosmo-Newbery Greenstone Belt and is located approximately 85km north-east of Laverton in a region known for its prolific gold endowment (refer Figure 1).
additional_details: The coverage area is specifically for the Cosmo Newbery project. The area was originally stated in km² and has been converted to hectares (1 km² = 100 hectares).
